message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high value and quality, it's worth more than $8,000 to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $9,500 for this exceptional item. This price not only ensures a fair transaction but also allows me to maintain a competitive edge in the market. I believe this offer strikes a balance between value and cost, making it an attractive proposition for both of us. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
